goal: Triage and produce concrete fixes or PR-ready patches for high-impact bugs: finalize run_tests.sh patch and branch/remote sync resolution, reproduce and profile the DSPy cache memory bug and recommend code fixes, and implement guardrails/regression tests for the Google Drive query loop

goal: Triage and produce concrete fixes or PR-ready patches for high-impact bugs: finalize run_tests.sh patch and branch/remote sync resolution, reproduce and profile the DSPy cache memory bug and recommend code fixes, and implement guardrails/regression tests for the Google Drive query loop
